name: dom-node-template-es6
description: create usefull html node wrapper object with es6 template string.

scripts.clean:dir: rm -rf ./build && mkdir build && npm run --silent sound:trash
scripts.build: clear; npm run --silent clean:dir && npm run --silent babelrc:build && npm run --silent babel && npm run --silent sound:microwave
scripts.test: clear; npm run --silent babelrc:mocha && npm run --silent babel && mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register --require jsdom-global/register --
scripts.test:all: clear; npm run --silent babelrc:mocha && npm run --silent babel && mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register --require jsdom-global/register && npm run --silent sound:plock
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run --silent test:all && npm run --silent build

author: Dennis Weiersh√§user <dennis.weiershaeuser@l3p-cv.com>
